reviews.text: Bottle. Pours pale yellow with small foamy white head, sweet malt aroma, low carbonation, lightly bitter sweetish malt taste, abrupt finish. Fresh and drinkable.
Clean yellow colour,smooth drinking fine lager.light bodied,light feeled.easy drinking german beer.
Draught @ Albion. Hazy dark orange with small foamy whitish head, orange peel aroma, medium carbonation, medium bitter citrusy taste, thin body, long citrus peel finish. Smooth and well balanced.
